summary: An intersecting tale with a multitude of characters living lives which, in one way or another, revolve around an old apartment block scheduled to be demolished.
cast: Vincent Spano|Stephen Mendillo|Chris Cooper|Tony Lo Bianco|Joe Morton|Charlie Yanko|Jace Alexander|Todd Graff|Scott Tiler|John Sayles|Frankie Faison|Gloria Foster|Tom Wright|Angela Bassett|David Strathairn|Maggie Renzi|Marianne Leone|S.J. Lang|Tony Denison|Kevin Tighe|Barbara Williams|Eileen Lynch|Bob North|Michael Mantell|Randle Mell|Josh Mostel|Jojo Smollett|Shake Dua|Joe Grifasi|Louis Zorich|Steven Randazzo|Gina Gershon|Miriam Colon|Rose Gregorio|Daryl Edwards|Jude Ciccolella|Jamie Tirelli|Serafin Jovet|Mason Daring|Olga Merediz|Bill Raymond|John Griesemer|Bernard Canepari|Blair Shannon|Tony Davis|Jon DeVries|Ginny Yang|Lawrence Tierney|Maeve Kinkead|Dale Carman|Ray Aranha|Jon Farris|Anjan Dutt|Dale Carman|Sandy McLeod|Michael Newman|Lare Roberts
title: Ciudad de esperanza
